channel.description: Recent content in leadership on Sebastian Staffa's Blog

item.title: On How To Lead Devs
item.description: During the last two years, my role in my current company has shifted from being purely a developer. It is still mainly a technical role where I am tasked with designing and implementing software, and I have also been entrusted with a few (junior) developers whose code I review and for whom I write tickets.
